data.name: ReadClient
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE, OCCUPATION, AE_CASE_NUMBER, DATE_OF_DEATH, ILLEGAL_ALIEN_IND, CURRENT_SPOUSE_MI, CURR_SPOUSE_1ST_NM, BIRTH_PLACE_STATE, EMERGENCY_PHONE, NAME_MIDDLE, NAME_MAIDEN, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_NUMBER, BIRTH_PLACE_CITY, CURR_MARITAL_STS, CUR_SPOUSE_LAST_NM, RACE, HAIR_COLOR, EYE_COLOR, WEIGHT, HEIGHT_FT, HEIGHT_IN, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, KSCARES_NUMBER, OTHER_AREA_CODE, EMERGENCY_AREA_CD, HOME_PHONE_AREA_CD, WORK_PHONE_AREA_CD, WORK_PHONE, WORK_PHONE_EXT, OTHER_PHONE_TYPE, OTHER_ID_INFO from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: UpdateClient
data.value: update CKT_CSE_PERSON set HOME_PHONE = @homePhone, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, HOME_PHONE_AREA_CD = @homePhoneAreaCd, WORK_PHONE_AREA_CD = @workPhoneAreaCd, WORK_PHONE = @workPhone where NUMB = @numb
